description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. vowed to improve the health of the United States by cleaning up the public health agencies that have become “sock puppets” of various industries. Kennedy, who ran as an independent presidential candidate before suspending his campaign and endorsing former President Donald Trump, explained in a new ad that he is partnering […]
title: RFK Jr. vows to ‘clean up’ public health agencies in partnership with Trump
